thread.title: Our 90s Life Icon, Urmila Matondkar, Is Finally On Instagram
thread.title_full: Our 90s Life Icon, Urmila Matondkar, Is Finally On Instagram

title: Our 90s Life Icon, Urmila Matondkar, Is Finally On Instagram
text:
facebook 
Are you even a 90s kid if Rangeela didn’t transform your pre-Y2k life? The movie gave us the ultimate gift, one that is more commonly known as Urmila Matondkar. Let’s be honest, Urmila is a life icon. Her outfits in the song Yai Re alone are enough proof of the greatness of the 90s era. Her body-shooketh moves were a testimony of how life means nothing without dance. And, her big hair was always full of secrets. You know what won’t be a secret anymore, though? Her life. Urmila has made her Insta-debut, looking all sorts of sugar and spice, like she did when she broke into the film scene. Here’s looking at at the actress’ first few social media milestones. 
She looked admittedly-in-love with husband, Mohsin Akhtar Mir. ❤ A photo posted by Urmila Matondkar (@urmilamatondkarofficial) on Dec 31, 2016 at 8:23am PST 
She wished us a Happy New Year, flaunting some ridiculously expensive jewels. A video posted by Urmila Matondkar (@urmilamatondkarofficial) on Dec 31, 2016 at 10:03am PST 
And, in one of our favourites, she looked like her Rangeela self, against a blindingly yellow wall. A photo posted by Urmila Matondkar (@urmilamatondkarofficial) on Jan 2, 2017 at 7:33pm PST 
You do you, Urmila.
